law.catch_line: On motion of the State or on request of a victim or witness, during a criminal trial or a juvenile d...
law.text: On motion of the State or on request of a victim or witness, during a criminal trial or a juvenile delinquency adjudicatory hearing, a court may prohibit the release of the address or telephone number of the victim or witness unless the court determines that good cause is shown for the release of the information.
